name: Template generic design process
description:
This template of the design process based on the double diamond has served me to explain how long the process would take in estimates, and or to show different stakeholder in which part of design I am in different projects.


Please feel free to modify and remix this template to fit your own needs as a designer. Remember that a framework is only good if itâ€™s flexible enough to modify for your own needs.


I hope you find it useful!
